translation.en: Are you mine?
Please be mine.
I am Bryan and you are Rufus.
translation.ja: 俺はブライアン お前はルーファスだ

translation.en: Hey, Rufus, wait!
Rufus, wait!
Rufus, wait! Rufus!
Rufus?
Rufus?
Come on. Where did you go?
translation.ja: おいで　どこへ行った？

translation.en: Who's there?
Who's out there?
Rufus?
Oh, my God.
Rufus.
[girl 1] Alright. I'll see you there.
[man 1] Eve, you shouldn't have done it.
You have a group of parents petitioning to have you fired now.
translation.ja: 保護者も 〝クビにしろ〞と

translation.en: I know who. They've been trying to get me fired since I started.
translation.ja: 彼らは最初から クビを望んでます

translation.en: And it seems like you want them to succeed.
Maine state law requires sexual education.
translation.ja: 性教育は 州法の義務です

translation.en: But local boards decide which topics.
And the topics they don't want covered, do we imagine they just disappear if we ignore them?
translation.ja: 教育委員会に従い タブーに触れるなと？

translation.en: I may agree with you but when you teach topics that aren't covered by the board,
translation.ja: 私は賛成だが 教育委員会は― 君の授業内容が 生徒には早いと判断した

translation.en: you're telling them about stuff that we've decided they're too young to know about.
translation.ja: 君の授業内容が 生徒には早いと判断した

translation.en: These kids know how to Google.
And some people believe that such information will lead to them having sex.
translation.ja: セックスを助長すると 考える人もいるんだ セックスを助長すると 考える人もいるんだ 原作 「霧」 スティーブン･キング著 セックスを助長すると 考える人もいるんだ

translation.en: I hope they don't. But I know they will. There's a difference.
translation.ja: 分かっています だから教えるんです

translation.en: [sighs deeply] I know.
Nevertheless the board has decided to place you on administrative leave.
translation.ja: 教育委員会は 君の休職を決めた

translation.en: There will be an official announcement tomorrow.
[man 2] We'll figure it out. Did you tell Alex?
translation.ja: 何とかなるよ アレックスに言った？

translation.en: [Eve] Yeah. She wasn't exactly surprised.
translation.ja: 言ったけど 驚かなかった

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Don't be.
Even if I resign, the other schools will know why. I won't get a new job.
translation.ja: 理由が知れるから 他の学校には行けない

translation.en: -I could go to work for the paper. -You already work too much.
translation.ja: 新聞の仕事がある あなたは働きすぎよ

translation.en: Or I could go back into advertising.
translation.ja: 広告の仕事に 戻ってもいい

translation.en: And how long will it be before you start hating me for that?
translation.ja: 私に愛想を 尽かさないのね

translation.en: We could move.
You'd do that for me?
I'd do anything for you.
You love it here.
It is pretty.
Not if you look closely.
Are you coming?
Hey, Nathalie.
Mind giving our garden the same treatment, while we're away?
If you take your bikes instead of the car.
You know, I saw at the library that it's the short trips that pollute the most.
translation.ja: 近場への運転が 一番の大気汚染なのよ

translation.en: -Hope you didn't drive there. -Dad!
We have to go.
Sorry, Nathalie. Messy garden it is.
translation.ja: すみませんね 手入れは大変だ

translation.en: [Kevin] So, uh, Alex,
any reason for your newfound interest in high-school football?
translation.ja: どうしてアメフトに興味を？

translation.en: Is it a fascination with team psychology? Or are you making a study of the athlete as a modern gladiator?
translation.ja: チームの心理学の研究？ それともアスリートの研究？

translation.en: -Yes, Dad. -Which one? The gladiator one.
translation.ja: そう　アスリートの研究よ

translation.en: Oh, yeah, because I, no, I had a feeling it might have something
translation.ja: ということは― クオーターバックのジェイを 研究する気か？

translation.en: to do with the piercing blue eyes of Jay Heisel, super star quarterback.
translation.ja: クオーターバックのジェイを 研究する気か？

translation.en: -Dad! -To which I would say--
I'm not interested.
To which I would say, there's more to life than good looks.
translation.ja: 言っておこう 見た目がすべてじゃない

translation.en: I know.
-[Kevin] Adrian meeting us there? -[Alex] If they let him.
translation.ja: エイドリアンは？ 外出できればね

translation.en: I'm done now.
Can I, uh, leave? I'm meeting Alex at the game.
translation.ja: アレックスと 試合に行ってもいい？

translation.en: Can I leave?
You know your father can't hear you when you're wearing makeup.
translation.ja: メイクを落とさないと無視よ

translation.en: We're just culturally biased to like it. All football is is white-male aggression.
translation.ja: 偏見だね アメフトの花形選手は白人だ

translation.en: Three-fourths of the NFL is black.
Maybe they're oppressed and this is their way out of a bankrupt education system.
translation.ja: 抑圧から抜け出す 唯一の道だからね

translation.en: Maybe they like football.
Maybe you can be oppressed and still like football.
Either way I'm gonna enjoy my male privilege and stare at their bodies.
translation.ja: 僕は選手の体を見て楽しむよ

translation.en: Is that one of the moms that got you fired?
-[groans] -[man 3] OK, Mia. Tell me where it is.
translation.ja: ミア　どこか教えろ

translation.en: Tell me where it is!
-Goddamn junkie! -[pants]
I don't know what you're talking about.
translation.ja: 何のことか分からない

translation.en: Rob told me I could do whatever I want to you,
translation.ja: “白状するまで 好きにやれ”と―

translation.en: as long as I make you talk, huh?
Well, maybe that's why Rob is dead now.
translation.ja: 待ちくたびれて死んでるかも

translation.en: -Bullshit! -[groans]
Well, why don't you call him?
Yeah, it's me. Where's Rob?
Your boy's gonna get lucky tonight.
It's not luck. He worked for it.
translation.ja: 運じゃない　努力だ

translation.en: Hey, Uncle Mike.
Hey, Connor. He sure can throw a ball.
translation.ja: コナー　ジェイは見事だった

translation.en: Yeah. Raised him to be a man.
I don't think my brother knows what a man is.
Dad...
The team wanna celebrate at Kristofferson's.
translation.ja: 今夜 祝勝会がある

translation.en: Go. You deserve it.
translation.ja: 行ってこい　頑張ったな

translation.en: Do you wanna come?
Alex is not old enough for a party.
translation.ja: パーティーは まだ早いわ

translation.en: Maybe we could have discussed it first.
Every time we discuss something, you give her just another fake hook to make it painful when I say no.
translation.ja: 期待させた分 余計 つらくなるわ

translation.en: -Maybe you shouldn't say no then. -I wish you would do it, but you don't.
translation.ja: 行かせればいい それなら私に押しつけず 自分で言って

translation.en: You say "maybe" and leave the dirty work to me.
translation.ja: それなら私に押しつけず 自分で言って

translation.en: OK. Yes.
-Yes, what? -Yes, she can go. She's almost 17.
translation.ja: もう17歳だ　行かせてやれ

translation.en: Which still makes her 16.
She has to get out and experience life.
translation.ja: いろいろ経験しないと

translation.en: It's time to let her go.
She'll be fine.
She just wants what's best for you.
translation.ja: ママはお前を思ってる

translation.en: Do you also think this is what's best for me?
-She loves you. -She has no idea what love is--
translation.ja: ママの愛だ 愛が分かってないのよ

translation.en: Hey.
translation.ja: 愛が分かってないのよ

translation.en: I remember when I first fell in love with her.
Every second I couldn't be with her killed me.
translation.ja: 離れるだけでつらかった

translation.en: Her love is different. It's... It's nuanced. It's rich.
translation.ja: ママの愛は パパたちの愛とは違う

translation.en: She doesn't understand our kind of love. Doesn't mean she loves any less.
translation.ja: でもママなりに お前を愛してるんだ

translation.en: Wait till your mom's asleep.
If you can get Adrian to go with you... you can go for a couple of hours.
translation.ja: エイドリアンと一緒なら 出かけてもいい

translation.en: No drinking.
Back by midnight, OK?
-Pretty nice of your dad to let you go. -Very nice of you to join me.
translation.ja: よく許してくれたね 付き添い ありがと

translation.en: Yeah, I'm the best.
And your dad was OK?
What's the point of asking permission if he won't talk to you?
translation.ja: 口も聞いてくれないよ

translation.en: -Still? -Two weeks and counting.
translation.ja: まだ？ もう２週間以上

translation.en: Not that I miss him calling me a freak.
I think you should just move in with us. I mean, we could adopt you.
translation.ja: だったら この際 うちの子になれば？

translation.en: Oh, like a little shelter puppy.
Yeah, then we could watch cheesy '80s movies every night.
translation.ja: そして毎晩 80年代の Ｂ級映画を見る

translation.en: Yeah, I'm sure Kevin and Eve would love that.
translation.ja: ご両親も賛成してくれるね

translation.en: Yeah, of course they would. Mom's at least 30% less annoying when you're around.
translation.ja: あんたがいるとママの イライラが30％減るんだもん

translation.en: They would love it. I'd love it.
And you are aware that pretty much all of these people are superficial assholes.
translation.ja: あいつら うわべだけの ロクデナシよ

translation.en: No, they're not.
Look,
I promise I will follow you wherever you wanna go when you fall in love with a guy, OK?
translation.ja: あんたに好きな男ができたら どこでもついてく

translation.en: Or a girl. I don't fall for gender. I fall for--
translation.ja: 女かも 男だからじゃなくて…

translation.en: For a personality. Sure.
Come on.
Hey.
I-I don't drink.
That's, like, totally offensive to the local culture.
translation.ja: いい子ぶると嫌われるわよ

translation.en: You can't be offensive.
translation.ja: いい子ぶったりしない

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Well, that was nice. Thank you.
translation.ja: おいしかった　どうも

translation.en: What now?
[chuckles] I don't know. We dance.
Sure.
What's the faggot doing here?
I'm here to hook up with hot football jocks.
translation.ja: アメフト選手のナンパさ

translation.en: Fuck you.
Oh? I thought you were a bottom.
-Yeah? -Yeah.
-That's what you thought? -Let him go!
translation.ja: そうか　上等だ やめてよ

translation.en: [Jay] Hey. What's going on?
-We're just having fun. -Doesn't look like he's having fun.
translation.ja: 楽しんでたんだ そうは見えない

translation.en: I'm sorry for my friends. Apparently, they forgot what century we live in.
translation.ja: 許してくれ 頭が固い連中なんだ

translation.en: Yeah. It's OK.
I'm glad you came.
I'm sorry about this. I'm gonna get you guys a drink.
translation.ja: 悪かった 飲もうよ

translation.en: I don't drink.
Well, if nothing else, then just to shake off this whole experience, OK?
translation.ja: うっぷんを晴らすには 飲むのが一番だよ

translation.en: OK.
But just one.
God. You're such a pussy. You know that, right?
translation.ja: ゴキブリでビビるなよ 逮捕してやろうか？

translation.en: -Do you want me to arrest him for you? -Fuck you.
translation.ja: ゴキブリでビビるなよ 逮捕してやろうか？ 黙れ

translation.en: [exhales] Something killed my dog. I-I-It killed my fucking dog.
A-A-And there was a... Something in the mist.
It's... It's on its way.
-W-W-We gotta warn-- -Calm down, soldier.
translation.ja: 早く警告しないと 落ち着けよ

translation.en: Don't tell me to calm down, OK?
translation.ja: 落ち着けるわけない 霧の中に何かいるんだ

translation.en: There was something in the mist. Do you not understand that? Something in it.
translation.ja: 落ち着けるわけない 霧の中に何かいるんだ 聞いてるのか？　何かが…

translation.en: OK, OK...
Now, can you tell us, have you done any drugs lately?
translation.ja: 最近 クスリを やらなかったか？

translation.en: Done any drugs, man? What the fuck?
translation.ja: クスリなんかやってない

translation.en: -I'm telling you something-- -Somthing killed your dog.
translation.ja: 何かが… 犬を殺したんだな

translation.en: Listen, you can't spread fear like that. It disrupts the public order.
translation.ja: 恐怖をあおると 町が大騒ぎになる

translation.en: Maybe you might wanna stay here until you sober up again.
translation.ja: しばらく ここで頭を冷やせ

translation.en: -We gotta get guns. -Whoa, whoa, whoa.
No, no! Get off!
-Get off me! -[Pundik] Stay down. I'm telling you!
translation.ja: 伏せろ！ 聞けよ　近づいてるんだ

translation.en: Go in!
translation.ja: 聞けよ　近づいてるんだ

translation.en: You don't understand.
It's coming.
[shouts] It's coming!
What are you doing here? Who are you?
Where's Mrs Lambert?
The old lady? She died two months ago.
I live here now.
I didn't know. Um...
I left some things in the shed--
Her stuff is in the storage locker downtown. They couldn't find her daughter.
translation.ja: トランクルームにある 娘が見つからない

translation.en: Who did you say you were?
Just, uh, an old friend.
Just an old friend?
Yeah, well, there was nothing of value in the garden shed. Just some old furniture.
translation.ja: 古い家具だけで 金目の物はなかった

translation.en: You want that, you'll have to take it up with the estate lawyer.
translation.ja: まず遺産管理人に連絡しろ

translation.en: Alex?
-What is it? -Um...
translation.ja: アレックスは どこ？

translation.en: -Where is she? -I-I don't know. Maybe she's, uh...
translation.ja: さあ　もしかしたら…

translation.en: [Eve] Sweetie, you have to tell us what happened. We can't help you unless you tell us.
translation.ja: 何があったか言わなきゃ 力になれないわ

translation.en: -I went to the party. -What? And I got drunk.
translation.ja: パーティーに行って 酔っ払った

translation.en: Very drunk.
The last thing I remember is someone helping me upstairs.
translation.ja: 上の部屋まで行った後は 覚えてない

translation.en: -[Kevin] Alex... -Then I blacked out.
[Kevin] Alex, I told you not to drink.
[Eve] You went to the party?
[Kevin] I told her she could go.
-[Eve] What are you talking about? -[Kevin] I said she could go with Adrian.
translation.ja: 何て？ “エイドリアンとなら いい”と

translation.en: -[Eve] Who allowed you to do that? -[Kevin] I allowed it.
translation.ja: いつの間に… 僕の独断だ

translation.en: [Eve] It's OK, sweetie. You're home now. That's what matters.
translation.ja: 無事に戻ったからいいわ

translation.en: -[Kevin] Alex? -[Eve] What's wrong?
When I woke up my...
I could feel what had happened.
translation.ja: 何があったか分かってきた

translation.en: There was blood on the sheets.
translation.ja: シーツに血が付いてたの

translation.en: I'm sorry. I shouldn't have gone.
translation.ja: ごめん　行かなきゃよかった

translation.en: [sniffles] This can never be your fault.
translation.ja: あなたは何も悪くない

translation.en: Alex...
Adrian knows what happened.
translation.ja: エイドリアンが知ってる

translation.en: He says it was... Jay.
translation.ja: 相手の男はジェイだって

translation.en: We have to take her to the police.
Alex, honey.
We should go now.
-Eve, I'm-- -You went behind my back.
Yes, because you... You're keeping her locked up.
translation.ja: 君があの子を… 閉じ込めてるからだ

translation.en: I have my reasons!
We can't fight right now.
We have to be there for her.
Then don't talk to me.
Well, it looks like you have calmed down a bit.
translation.ja: 少し落ち着いたようだな

translation.en: Why don't you tell me who you are? I'll file the report. We can all go home.
translation.ja: 身元を明かせば出してやる

translation.en: What's your name?
Bryan Hunt.
And where do you live?
I don't... Um...
I'm homeless.
Social security number?
I don't remember.
Look, please, just listen to me.
Hey, hey! No! You can't do that!
translation.ja: おい！ 暴力は違法だぞ！

translation.en: Oh, yeah? You can remember the law, huh?
Well, it looks like we are calling Arrowhead,
translation.ja: 〝アローヘッド〞 〝アローヘッド〞 アローヘッドのメンバーか ここに入ってろ

translation.en: and you are staying a while longer.
translation.ja: アローヘッドのメンバーか ここに入ってろ

translation.en: -Get me prints on that weirdo. -Please.
translation.ja: 指紋を採れ やめろ

translation.en: OK. Huh!
Kevin?
What can I do for you?
Maybe it's best we speak to someone else.
Hey, Jay. We need you to come with us.
translation.ja: ジェイ　一緒に来てくれ

translation.en: -Why? What's going on? -Just please come with us.
translation.ja: どうして？ とにかく来てくれ

translation.en: Is it something with my dad?
We just need you to come down to the station and answer a few questions.
translation.ja: 署に来て 質問に答えてくれ

translation.en: -OK? -About what?
You're being investigated for sexual assault.
Come on.
Good, uh, game yesterday, guys.
translation.ja: 昨日はいい試合だった

translation.en: Did you see that? All the toads?
translation.ja: 見て　カエルがたくさんいる

translation.en: Hmm. Probably a small earthquake.
The police had a few more questions for her and then you can go home.
translation.ja: 警察の聴取はあと少しです

translation.en: She should see a therapist as soon as possible.
translation.ja: 早くセラピストの所へ

translation.en: From you she needs stability, safety.
translation.ja: 落ち着かせてください

translation.en: -Kevin, I can't say anything-- -I need to know.
translation.ja: 何も言えないの 教えてくれ

translation.en: [sighs] There are signs of intercourse, but no violence.
translation.ja: 性行為の痕跡はあるけど 暴力はなし

translation.en: There are also traces of Triazolam in her blood.
translation.ja: 血液からは睡眠導入剤が

translation.en: She was passed out.
-What about the DNA? Can't you-- -We took one.
translation.ja: ＤＮＡ鑑定は？ 手配したけど レイプの証拠にならない

translation.en: And that will show who, but not that it was rape.
translation.ja: 手配したけど レイプの証拠にならない

translation.en: There's a witness, right?
I don't know what to do.
You already went to the police.
-You don't have to do anything-- -No, I don't know what to do.
translation.ja: 何もしなくていい どうしたらいいか分からない

translation.en: I can't watch TV. I can't read.
translation.ja: テレビを見る気もしないし

translation.en: I wanted to listen to some music and I had to pick a song, and I was, like, the song I pick,
translation.ja: 家に帰って 好きな曲を 聴こうとしても―

translation.en: it will always be the first song I heard after...
translation.ja: その曲をイヤな記憶に したくなくて…

translation.en: Hm, we can choose a really bad song.
translation.ja: それなら嫌いな曲を 選べばいい

translation.en: Like a stupid Katy Perry song, or something.
translation.ja: ケイティ･ペリーなんかをね

translation.en: That way you won't ruin a good song.
I like Katy Perry. You hate her.
translation.ja: ケイティ･ペリーは好きよ

translation.en: Right.
But thanks.
You can't let them win, you know?
You know how this is gonna go. Everyone loves Jay.
translation.ja: どうなるか分かるだろ ジェイは人気者だ

translation.en: They will say you're a liar. And that it's your fault.
translation.ja: 君がウソつき呼ばわりされる

translation.en: Who are "they"?
The whole town.
I shouldn't have gone behind your back.
Do you have any idea what it's like having been bad cop for 16 years?
translation.ja: 16年間 疎まれ役の 私の気持ちが分かる？

translation.en: 16 years of me saying no?
16 years of a daughter who loves you and who hates...?
translation.ja: あなただけが 娘に愛されてきた

translation.en: Jesus!
-[tires screeching] -Get back in.
Get back in!
[Connor] If they haven't pressed charges, the case is weak.
And Ron... Ron's a good lawyer. Knows what he's doing.
translation.ja: ロンは敏腕弁護士だ 頼りになる

translation.en: You just... You do what he says.
translation.ja: ロンの指示に 従っていればいい

translation.en: Follow his lead and be honest with him.
translation.ja: ロンの指示に 従っていればいい 正直に言っても 決して口外されない

translation.en: You can tell him anything, but you can't repeat it, right?
translation.ja: 正直に言っても 決して口外されない

translation.en: You're not going to jail. I guarantee that.
translation.ja: 刑務所には行かない それは確かだ

translation.en: You hear me?
Why do you talk to me as if I did it?
I'm just saying. You're not going to jail.
translation.ja: 刑務所には行かないと 言ってるだけだ

translation.en: I thought I told you to get out of here.
-Just let me-- -This is private property.
translation.ja: 聞いて… 私有地に入る権利はない

translation.en: You got no business being here.
translation.ja: 私有地に入る権利はない

translation.en: Hey, I'm not here to hurt you.
translation.ja: 迷惑は かけないわ

translation.en: Yeah, you're damn right.
translation.ja: 迷惑は かけないわ だろうな

translation.en: -[siren wails] -What's the matter?
Are you afraid of the cops?
You should have thought of that before you tried to steal whatever this is.
translation.ja: 盗みに入る前に やめるべきだったな

translation.en: Don't.
Holy fuck.
I'm not sorry.
translation.ja: せいせいしたよ 〝アナ･ランバート〞

translation.en: Get on the ground!
Let me see your hands.
There was something in the mist. I-I-It's on its way. W-W-W-We gotta warn people.
translation.ja: 霧の中に何かいるんだ 警告しないと

translation.en: Morning.
Morning.
What are you doing?
Alex is not safe here. We're staying at my sister's.
translation.ja: アレックスと ここを離れる

translation.en: What if she needs help?
I'll find a therapist in St. Vincent.
And Dr. Sing phoned in a prescription for Valium. I'll pick it up.
translation.ja: 処方された精神安定剤も 受け取る

translation.en: OK. I'll pack some things.
translation.ja: そうか　荷造りするよ

translation.en: You're staying here.
Eve...
It was a party. There's no way I could have known.
translation.ja: こんなことになるなんて…

translation.en: But I could, which is why I said no.
How could you have known?
Because I've spent my entire life around guys like Jay.
translation.ja: ああいう連中が 身近にいたから分かる

translation.en: I can't be with you right now, OK?
translation.ja: 今は一緒にいられない

translation.en: Come up in a few days. Then we'll talk.
translation.ja: 何日か経ってから話を

translation.en: You should get the window fixed, and then go to the police with the harassment.
translation.ja: 窓ガラスの修理と 通報をお願い

translation.en: [Benedict] I thought we'd agreed
translation.ja: ネットで陰謀説を探すのは やめる約束だろ ネットで陰謀説を探すのは やめる約束だろ 〝ブリッジヴィル･ ポスト〞

translation.en: you'd stop looking for conspiracy theories on the internet.
translation.ja: ネットで陰謀説を探すのは やめる約束だろ 〝ブリッジヴィル･ ポスト〞

translation.en: You know Dr. Kleerick says it's not good for you.
This is not the internet, it's the Bridgeville Post. I'm fine.
translation.ja: 新聞を見てるだけだから 何ともない

translation.en: Now go back to your comics.
No. Read them all.
Ah.
"Six people were found dead. Presumably killed by a bear."
translation.ja: “６人の遺体を発見 クマに襲われたか”

translation.en: "Other animals came down the mountain in large numbers,
translation.ja: “他にもヘラジカや キツネなど―”

translation.en: including moose and deer and foxes."
translation.ja: “大量の動物が 山から下りてきた”

translation.en: No frogs, though.
[Nathalie] "Some locals fear it's a Black Spring...
a legend of nature turning sour,
as evidenced by the frozen lake being black like a rotten tooth."
translation.ja: “湖が虫歯のように 黒ずむのが その証しだ”

translation.en: Well...
The Bridgeville Post sure ain't what it used to be.
translation.ja: ブリッジヴィル･ポストも 落ちぶれたな

translation.en: -[sighs] What do you want? -Maybe I should speak to Officer Pundik.
translation.ja: 用件は？ パンディク巡査を

translation.en: Pundik is picking up Adrian for questioning.
translation.ja: エイドリアンと話してる

translation.en: -Why? -Because he's a witness.
translation.ja: どうして？ 目撃者だ　当然だろう

translation.en: Why do you think?
translation.ja: 目撃者だ　当然だろう

translation.en: Are you OK to talk to me? Or you can wait until Pundik's done.
translation.ja: 俺と話すか？ パンディクを待つか？

translation.en: Stay right where you are.
I'm sorry. I know this isn't what you want. But it's for the best. The way things are right now.
translation.ja: 町を離れたくなくても こうするのが一番なの

translation.en: You understand that... don't you?
translation.ja: 言ってること 分かるでしょ

translation.en: Everything I do, I do to protect you.
translation.ja: あなたを守るためなのよ

translation.en: Protect me? You're not protecting me, you're controlling me.
translation.ja: 守るため？ 私を支配してるだけよ

translation.en: [Eve] Sweetie, just...
Please! You just don't want me to do what you did.
translation.ja: 同じ失敗を してほしくないのね

translation.en: But guess what? I won't 'cause I'm nothing like you.
translation.ja: 私はママと違うから大丈夫

translation.en: You're embarrassing yourself at school, and...
What do you mean do what I did?
-What do you mean? -You said it yourself. It's a small town.
translation.ja: 何のこと？ ここは小さい町よ

translation.en: I know.
Everyone knows.
Knows what?
That you were a slut.
I'm gonna go pick up the Valium.
Do you wanna come, or do you wanna wait here?
-[Connor] It's amazing. -[Kevin] It's moving against the wind.
translation.ja: 何だ あれは 風に逆らってる

translation.en: Hey, Alex.
Dad, will you please come with us? I don't wanna go with Mom.
translation.ja: 来て　ママといたくないの

translation.en: I'll be there soon, honey. You'll be fine. Where's Mom?
translation.ja: パパもすぐ行く　ママは？

translation.en: We're at the mall. Dad, please. I don't wanna leave.
translation.ja: ショッピングモールよ 町を出たくない

translation.en: -It will be fine, honey. -She'll...
Hello?
-[Connor] Wow. -Alex?
Signal's gone.
Well, let's go back inside. It will blow over in a minute.
translation.ja: 中へ戻ろう　そのうち収まる

translation.en: No, just... just wait. Just wait. I wanna get, uh, a photo for the missus.
translation.ja: 待ってくれ 写真を女房に送りたい

translation.en: Great. You do that, Pundik. We'll see you inside.
God.
Oh, God!
Oh, God! Help me!
[Pundik] Oh, God! Help me!
Shit! Help me!
OK, get in the car. We gotta go.
translation.ja: 車に乗れ　逃げるぞ

translation.en: -What is it? What's going on? -Come on! Let's go!
translation.ja: 一体どうした？ 早く乗れ！

translation.en: Adrian. Wait in the car.
translation.ja: エイドリアンが　待ってろ

translation.en: Kevin!
Solve the mystery?
It was the butler.
Shall we wait till it's gone?
It's beautiful.
We can drag the bikes.
-Yeah. -This way.
[Nathalie] It's like that time at the inn up by Chocolate Lake.
translation.ja: チョコレートレイクに 泊まった時みたい

translation.en: Except we stayed in bed.
This... this way, I think.
Oh... no. Wrong, wrong... wrong direction.
translation.ja: 違う　こっちじゃない

translation.en: These trees were by the church, so that means the bikes must be that way.
translation.ja: この木は教会のそばだから 自転車はあっちだ

translation.en: It's too thick, hon.
Let's get back inside.
Let's go.
-Are you real? -We are. We are. We are real.
translation.ja: 人間か？ もちろんだ

translation.en: -But it's all real. -Put down the gun.
translation.ja: だまされないぞ 下ろせ

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I couldn't know.
-Forgive me. -[gunshot]
Mrs Raven?
Are you OK?
-What's going on? -It's OK. We just have to--
translation.ja: 何が？ 大丈夫　行こう

translation.en: [Bryan] Help! Help!
In here.
Help!
Over here, man. Help.
Hey, get us the fuck out of here, man. You gotta get us out.
-Calm down. -We'll die if we stay.
translation.ja: 落ち着け ここにいたら死ぬ

translation.en: There's something in the mist. It killed my dog. You can't let us stay.
translation.ja: 犬も殺されたんだ 置いていくな

translation.en: [shouts] Shut the fuck up!
What has happened out there?
I don't know.
And what are you gonna do?
Find my wife and daughter.
[scoffs] No. What are you gonna do with us?
Look, what... Whatever's happened will be over soon.
translation.ja: いいか　これはすぐ終わる

translation.en: Please. The sheriff thought I was crazy, but I warned them about the mist.
translation.ja: 俺は霧を警告したら 怪しまれただけだ

translation.en: Don't let her out. She looks unstable. Like she did something bad.
translation.ja: あの女はダメ 絶対 何かやってる

translation.en: Not to anyone good.
translation.ja: 善人には手は出さない

translation.en: Unlike me...
you're a nice guy.
And you're never gonna be able to live with yourself, if you leave us behind,
translation.ja: 私たちを 置き去りにしたら―

translation.en: 'cause if you do, we die and you know it.
translation.ja: 良心の呵責(かしゃく)に苦しむわよ

translation.en: Besides, if there's something out there,
translation.ja: それに― 外に何かいるなら どう生き延びるつもり？

translation.en: how are you gonna survive taking care of a... scared little freak
translation.ja: 外に何かいるなら どう生き延びるつもり？ その変態は役に立たない

translation.en: on your own?
translation.ja: その変態は役に立たない

translation.en: Get us out.
And we'll help you.
The more, the better.
I'll find the keys.
I'm not a freak.
And if you don't apologize, I'm gonna tell Kevin you threatened me.
translation.ja: 謝らなきゃ 脅されたと言うよ

translation.en: See you get out of here then.
So...
you've got balls after all.
translation.ja: タマはついてるようね

translation.en: But I don't take orders from anyone.
translation.ja: 私は誰の指図も受けない

translation.en: And whatever's out there, you're probably better off with a verbally abusive bitch protecting you.
translation.ja: そして あんたは 私がいてよかったと思うはず

translation.en: OK?
OK.
Bitch.
[pharmacist] Eve Copeland.
Here you go.
-Mrs Carmody. -You should be ashamed of yourself.
translation.ja: カーモディさん 恥を知りなさい

translation.en: Why? Because I showed them a condom? Or because I mentioned oral sex?
translation.ja: コンドームを見せたこと？ オーラルセックスの話？

translation.en: Because you can raise your child any way you want to, and clearly you have,
translation.ja: 自分の子はどう育てても いいけど―

translation.en: but leave my child out of it.
Oh, I'm pretty sure Eric here knows what a blowjob is,
translation.ja: エリックは フェラチオを知ってる

translation.en: seeing how I caught him watching porn on his phone the other day.
translation.ja: この前 スマホで ポルノを見てたわ

translation.en: You pathetic bitch.
[Eve] Alex?
-Alex? -Mom?
translation.ja: アレックス ママ　どこ？

translation.en: -Mom... -What's going on?
Mom, we need to get inside. Now.
It's OK. We're inside.
No! Stop! There's something out there!
translation.ja: 出ちゃダメ　外にいるの

translation.en: -What? -I don't know, but...
I'm so fed up with you people and your need for attention.
translation.ja: 親子で気を引きたいの？

translation.en: It's true.
Said the girl who lied about getting raped.
Come.
What's going on?
You're not getting one.
Are you fucking kidding me?
Do you even know where to point that thing?
That's the way it's gonna be.
Alright. This way. Connor will be waiting outside.
translation.ja: こっちだ 外にコナーが

translation.en: Did anyone call the police?
No. There's no phone signal.
translation.ja: 無理よ　つながらない

translation.en: OK. I just wanna go home.
translation.ja: もう うちに帰りたい

translation.en: I know, but we're gonna have to wait till we find out what's going on.
translation.ja: 状況が分かるまで 待ったほうがいいわ

translation.en: Do you trust me now?
It will be fine.
The police will help us. Dad will get here.
translation.ja: 警察が来るし パパも来てくれるわ

translation.en: I'm here.
We're safe.
[Kevin] I trust you.
[Eve] You're safe.
